## Promoted articles

- [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account)
- [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification)
- [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614-How-do-I-send-money-to-another-GCash-account)

Reach your financial goals by investing with GCash’s safe and secure money-growing products to get the most out of your hard-earned money!

### **[GSave](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/sections/360004696233)**

Start your savings journey to prepare for your future with our GSave banking partners: [UNO Digital Bank](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/sections/14213898727449--UNOready-GCash-by-UNO-Bank), [Maybank](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/sections/9316808199321-EzySave-by-Maybank), [BPI](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/sections/4935148926489-MySaveUp-by-BPI) and [CIMB](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/sections/4840256874137-GSave-by-CIMB).

### **[GInvest](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/categories/20495893354649-GInvest)**

Manage local and international investments with GCash’s premiere Wealth Management products:

[**GFunds**](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/sections/360004696433-GFunds)

Invest for as low as PHP 50 in funds handled by the biggest fund managers in the country, ATRAM and BPI Wealth

[**GStocks** **PH**](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/sections/12736977790233-GStocks-PH)

Choose to invest in over 280+ local companies listed on the Philippine Stock Exchange.

[**GStocks Global**](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/sections/10954951212313-GStocks-Global)\- Coming soon to all users!

Buy, sell, and manage well-known international stocks listed on the New York Stock Exchange.

### [**GCrypto**](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/sections/15635777518105)

Want an alternative to traditional investments? Explore the world of Web 3.0 by buying and selling crypto straight from your GCash app with GCrypto.
